name: Jungle Jam (Daxic)
description:
Controls:
A/D - left/right movement
Space - jump
LMB - shoot
R - reload weapons
Q or 1 and 2 - change weapons
E - use
F - pick up weapons

How long can you survive in a hostile alien jungle? Better long enough for that damned reset button to activate!

Jungle Jam is a fast-paced shooter with platforming elements set in an alien jungle cave full of bats, wasps and fish that want to shoot and/or impale you! But worry not. If you survive long enough a very sus button will activate and grant you unimaginable powers!

GameJam team:

Daxic - Gamedesign, enviroment Instagram Web

Carko - Programmer

Tollona - Animator, graphic designer

JakeSanabria - Music, SFX Instagram Web
